entry.name: event.metaKey
entry.title: event.metaKey
entry.desc: Indicates whether the META key was pressed when the event fired.

longdesc.p: Returns a boolean value (true or false) that indicates whether or not the META key was pressed at the time the event fired. This key might map to an alternative key name on some platforms.

example.desc: Determine whether the META key was pressed when the event fired.
